title: Ecclesiastes Week 1 with Dr. George Grant
description:
In this episode of the She Reads Truth Podcast, Raechel and Amanda are joined by pastor, author, and long-time friend Dr. George Grant. Dr. Grant is a brilliant theologian and student of the Bible, and together the three take a look at King Solomon's tireless search to find meaning, as recorded in the book of Ecclesiastes. Life under the sun is wearisome and temporary, but when we put on our spiritual bifocals to view the world through a kingdom lens, we find lasting beauty and hope. 

Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 1 of the She Reads Truth Ecclesiastes reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com.
